descriptionHtml:
[size=6]Read it before install![/size]

[size=4]Thanks for all who tested this mod before.
If you already have this mod instaled some bugs may occur as:[/size]
- Game crash if you are inside the home
- Game also may crash if you are near the world place
- Inside house will be a mess (fix creating another character)
- Braith may not be in her cage

[size=5]Important the mod is not finished, i had some personal problems those
last months and i could not finish as i wanted, and i can't say when i
will be able to finish this project.[/size]

[size=5]Instalation:[/size]
For manual instalation just extract the archive
silverplace.esp in your data folder. No resource pack are requested.

[size=5]
House Features:[/size]
- Warehouse / Planning Room
- Greenhouse (no heartfire required)
- Trophy Room
- Dinner/Fireplace/Book Shelf
- Kitchen (no heartfire required)
- Armory
- Library
- Enchant / Alchemy Station
- Shrines / Stones
Basement
- Storage Room
- BlackSmith / Smelther
- Trainning Room
- Torture Room (with Braith... I hate her)

[size=5]Well as always... bugs and future development

Bugs:[/size]

[size=5]Home bugs:[/size]
-Dragon Statues inside the house.
-Some books are not finished yet.
-Mannequins may move
-Mannequins look as live entity
-Weapons and shields may fall from racks
-Bounty in Whiterun if you hit Braith
-Braith in cage is a nice kid

[size=5]BookShelfs bugs:[/size]
-you can extend to 7 books on shelfs
-you can put 7 books but only 6 will be displayed
-you can duplicate books
-Books may fall from Shelfs

[size=5]Exterior bugs:[/size]
-Is not even near to be finished
-No roof
-Safes are not locked
-River flows in a weird way
-No navmesh (developers will know)
-Followers can get stocked inside the home
-Dragons get stocked on bridge
-Dragons get stocked on constructios
-My horses like to fly

[size=5]Quest bugs:[/size]
[size=4]As i do not start to make the history mode you may find somenon used
characters and Objects.[/size]
- 5 guards from silverplace will be stoped near to house (they will fight one day)
- some books and notes
- and tes2 cell (have a chest there find it :D )
author: Silver
